price: The best among them said, “Did I not say to you to glorify Allah[6]?”
arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ
footnotes: [6] i.e., remember Him by saying, "...if Allah wills." Or "praise" and "thank" Allah for His bounty.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla awsaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lawlā tusabbiḥūna
